article:
The morning after the wedding, my husband and I had a lunch and opened the wedding gifts and began a honeymoon trip.  _  were going back to the farm for a night, then heading off.
As my husband was  _  , I noticed he'd placed several boxes and my  _  in the luggage crate on the top of the  _  .I said that maybe he should  _  them.He turned and gave a wink , saying."It'll be right, they won't come off.  _  me!"
Halfway home we  _  a car which came racing up beside us and a lady  _  us down.She said she'd  _  a red suitcase an the side of the
road several kilometers  _  and was wondering if

and, to our surprise, discovered that yes indeed-the case had  _  off, including my jewellery box, all the wedding cards, and our

We  _  back, but the case was gone.We made enquires at the local police station,  _  as the road was a common link between several  towns, we weren't very  _  .We set off the next day on our honeymoon, putting it all down to a bad lock, I was able to remember most of the gifts  _  and sent off thank you notes, but the loss of
it all was very sad.
Seven years later, my father got a call from a lady asking of I'd lost a red suitcase on my  _  day.Her husband, a farm agent, had stopped to   pick up  the
